channel.title: Spawners?
channel.description:
Hi everyone, i am asking about mob spawners.
My question goes like this:
I have a Bukkit MineCraft 1.0.0 server. I have seen many videos made by the yogscast and i have noticed that they have mob spawners that spawn zombies, spiders etc...
Now, my spawners only seem to spawn pigs.
How do i get like a skeleton, zombie or spider spawner?

item.title: Spawners?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

If you put a sign next to a spawner in 1.0 saying “Spawn:Pig” or whatever it will spawn that mob.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawners?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

MCEdit allows you to edit your map and place mob spawners of all different kinds anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawners?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

There is a mod called mobspawner gui. Does what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawners?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You find them in caves, if you spawn a mob spawner it generally spawns pigs and so on (Unless something has changed in 1.0).

Read full topic
